name: Torcorvion I: Alikaster
description:
Torcorvion I: Alikaster is the first chapter in one of the next breathtakingly expansive universes ever created by a single person.

Alikaster may not boast much in the way of complexity - but what it lacks in depth and customization, it makes up for by bringing back that element of fun and imagination that games used to have.

It is up to you to find and eliminate the source of the undead corruption that has been plaguing the small Lumber-Mill Village of Alikaster.

With a dungeon that is packed full of random encounters, the fun never stops! Defeat enemies, grab their loot, and get stronger to take on the evil hiding within the cave!
